alert.note: Alert for Escambia Inland; Okaloosa Inland; Santa Rosa Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued March 18 at 3:13PM EDT until March 20 at 11:00AM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM SUNDAY TO 10 AM CDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 26 expected. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southwest Alabama, northwest Florida and southeast Mississippi. * WHEN...From 10 PM Sunday to 10 AM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Escambia Inland; Okaloosa Inland; Santa Rosa Inland
